items.sentence: Tom and Mary often spend Monday afternoons together.
Tom did everything he could to get Mary to help him.
Tom is waiting for Mary to come and give him a ride.
Tom met Mary in Boston and they became good friends.
I'm surprised to see you smoking. You didn't use to.
The two brothers couldn't get along with each other.
I've been writing since two o'clock without a break.
I'd like a round-trip ticket from Boston to Chicago.
I can't stand that nasty attitude of his any longer.
Tom said that it isn't the first time that happened.
